page.title: 12PUBLIC OPINIONS OF GOOLE
page.content: 54% of those{interviewed}were happy with Goole as a shopping centre although 67% were not happy with public transport provision. 92% were in favour of the Goole/Hull rail link being kept open.61% did not think they got value for money from their{rates. 55% thought roads were in need of repair and 86% expressed their dissatisfaction with the state of the pavements - especially the fouling by dogs.91% suggested more litter bins and 86% felt more public conveniences were needed.24% thought Goole was quite,or very,clean although 60% said it could be made cleaner.74% wanted more telephone boxes and 89% expressed concern about the state of existing ones.88% felt the need for more post offices. 88% thought Goole a{good place}to live and raise a family.
